entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
